resources.string: Board made of %1$d*%1$d cells containing %2$d bombs

Welcome to the minesweeper.

 In this game you have to reveal every empty cell without ever revealing a hidden bomb.

 Touch a cell to try revealing it.

 You can also press the flag button, then a cell, in order to mark it, if you think there is
 a bomb there.

 To help you, the revealed cells indicate how many bombs there are in the 8 adjacent
 cells.

 Good Luck!
